Hero.title: Software Engineer
Hero.stack: NestJS | Node.js | React.js | TypeScript | Redis | MongoDB | PostgreSQL | Jest
Hero.description: I am a Software Engineer with a track record of designing and implementing scalable, efficient, and user-centric solutions. With hands-on experience in NestJS, React.js, and modern development practices, I excel in building robust backend systems, microservices architectures, and efficient automation workflows. Experienced in distributed systems, event-driven architectures, and AI agent frameworks. Let's connect to discuss technology, collaboration, or exciting opportunities in software development!

Projects.name: Developer's Marketplace
Projects.description: Architected a microservices, event-driven marketplace supporting escrow, milestone payments, and role-based access control. Uses Kafka for async workflows and gRPC for service-to-service calls. Developed a real-time notification system using Redis, WebSockets, and BullMQ for bid updates and order events.

Projects.name: Hotel.com
Projects.description: Built a hotel booking system with advanced search and booking flows, integrating Stripe for secure payments and Cloudinary for media management. Optimized backend APIs through asynchronous data processing, indexing, and query optimization, ensuring consistent performance under heavy traffic.

Projects.name: ColComm
Projects.description: Created a chat platform to connect mentees and mentors based on specific fields of expertise and skills. Implemented AI-based content moderation by using FastText with Random Forest algorithms to filter out hate speech and abusive content, achieving 94% accuracy.

Projects.name: Serverless Medium
Projects.description: Built a serverless blogging platform using Cloudflare Workers and Hono for scalability. Utilized Prisma ORM with Prisma Accelerate for efficient connection pooling. Enabled type-safe data sharing via an NPM package. Implemented secure authentication with access and refresh tokens and used Zod for data validation.

Projects.name: ImpactNGO
Projects.description: Built a web application to address the problem of people and restaurants and other stores who have leftover or extra food, clothes or other items, connecting them with NGOs who can distribute these resources to those in need.

description: Redesigned authentication flow and implemented two-layer caching in Automation Execution framework, removing cross-service dependency and improving execution speed by 22.2%.
Designed a distributed Stop Agent Execution system using Redis Pub/Sub for cross-pod signaling, enabling unified cancellation for nested agents and preventing orphaned jobs.
Refactored the Queue Service into an independent microservice, enforcing separation of concerns, improving resource isolation, and enabling horizontal scalability across automation workloads.
Converted blocking components to asynchronous and event-driven workflows, reducing latency by 35% and supporting 2.5Ã— higher concurrency under load.
Contributed to the development of the AI Agent Framework, enabling users to create and trigger custom agents manually or via webhooks.
Built the Model Context Protocol (MCP) server, integrating CMS APIs with BrandKit AI to enable LLM-optimized contextual interactions.
Implemented retry mechanisms for failed automations, improving fault tolerance and reducing incident resolution time by 30%.
Developed triggers and actions for automation workflows, improving operational efficiency by reducing manual tasks.
Implemented robust server-side validations, strengthening application security and minimizing support escalations.
Created comprehensive unit and end-to-end tests using Jest and Playwright, increasing test coverage by 24%.
